attributes.action: have an enquiry into breaches of Human rights by the British Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Government are accused of breaching the Human Rights of Mr William David Pritchard and Mr Gordon Pritchard and are accused of ethnic cleansing and asset stripping. These two brothers have had a life sentence imposed on them, but are not guilty, their crime is being Welsh, and defending the legal rights of the Welsh nation.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
